description:
Start taking impressive photos that you will be proud to share.

Master photography fundamentals summarised into a simple, compact step-by-step system, which is easy to learn and use when you are out taking photos. It's a system that I have developed for myself, and would now like to share with you. It compresses my 10 years of learnings into 2 hours of video. It is a shortcut that will save you the time and effort I had to go through to learn what I know. It will dramatically shorten your learning curve.

Every technique is clearly explained in minutes, packed with examples from my own experience, and ready for you to practice.

I will reveal the most important elements of great photography, and typical mistakes that most people make.

As well as Udemy 30 day refund guarantee, you have my personal promise that you will be excited and inspired by what you can do with your camera.

This course is not about camera controls. It is about the artistic side of taking great images. I will have a separate course on camera controls in case you need it.
title: Photography - 5 Steps to Great Photos
